00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATION_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATION_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/io.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "logging.hpp"
00031 #include "InvertMatrix.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/SpectrumPeak.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace Result {
00035   class Calibration : public Base {
00036   public:
00037     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Calibration> sptr;
00038     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Calibration> Handle;
00039     typedef boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<double> Matrix;
00040     typedef boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double> Vector;
00041 
00042     Calibration(ptime time, 
00043                 const std::vector<Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle>& peaks,
00044                 double offsetMax, 
00045                 double ppmMax,
00046                 size_t n=2)
00047       : Base("Calibration", time)
00048       , n_(n)
00049       , q_(n,n)
00050       , x_(n)
00051       , offsetMax_(offsetMax)
00052       , ppmMax_(ppmMax) {
00053       using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00054       // add pseudo-observation (0,0) when single measurement
00055       const bool single_measurement(peaks.size() == 1);
00056       size_t n_meas(peaks.size() + single_measurement);
00057       Matrix a(n_meas, n);
00058       Vector y(n_meas);
00059       for (size_t u(0); u<peaks.size(); ++u) {
00060         y(u)   = peaks[u]->fMeasured();
00061         double t(1.0);
00062         for (size_t v(0); v<n; ++v) {
00063           a(u,v) = t; t *= peaks[u]->fReference();
00064         }
00065       }
00066       if (single_measurement) {
00067         y(1)   = 0;
00068         a(1,0) = 1;
00069       }
00070       // least squares inversion
00071       Matrix ata(prod(trans(a),a));
00072       ASSERT_THROW(ublas_util::InvertMatrix(ata, q_) == true);
00073       x_ = prod(q_, Vector(prod(trans(a),y)));
00074       ASSERT_THROW(std::abs(x_(0))   < offsetMax_);
00075       ASSERT_THROW(std::abs(x_(1)-1) < 1e-6*ppmMax_);
00076     }
00077     Calibration(ptime time,
00078                 const Matrix& q,
00079                 const Vector& x,
00080                 double offsetMax,
00081                 double ppmMax)
00082       : Base("Calibration", time)
00083       , n_(2)
00084       , q_(q)
00085       , x_(x)
00086       , offsetMax_(offsetMax)
00087       , ppmMax_(ppmMax) {}
00088 
00089     virtual ~Calibration() {}
00090     virtual std::string toString() const {
00091       std::stringstream ss;
00092       ss << Base::toString()
00093          << " x=" << x()
00094          << " q=" << q();
00095       return ss.str();
00096     }    
00097     const Vector& x() const { return x_; } // polynomial coefficients
00098     const Matrix& q() const { return q_; } // variance-covariance matrix for x
00099 
00100     // return a handle with a "worst-case" covariance matrix
00101     Base::Handle withWorstCaseCov(std::string name) const {
00102       Matrix q(2,2);
00103       q(1,0) = q(0,1) = 0.0;
00104       q(0,0) = std::pow(  offsetMax_, 2);
00105       q(1,1) = std::pow(1e-6*ppmMax_, 2);
00106       Base::Handle h(new Calibration(approx_ptime(), q, x_, offsetMax_, ppmMax_));
00107       h->set_name(name);
00108       return h;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // makes a default calibration object with huge errors
00112     static Base::Handle makeDefault(ptime t, std::string name) {
00113       const double offsetMax = 999;
00114       const double ppmMax    = 9999;
00115       Matrix q(2,2);
00116       q(1,0) = q(0,1) = 0.0;
00117       q(0,0) = std::pow(  offsetMax, 2);
00118       q(1,1) = std::pow(1e-6*ppmMax, 2);
00119       Vector x(2);
00120       x(0) = 0.0;
00121       x(1) = 1.0;
00122       Base::Handle h(new Calibration(t, q, x, offsetMax, ppmMax));
00123       h->set_name(name);
00124       return h;
00125     }
00126 
00127     // returns a value,RMS pair
00128     std::pair<double, double> cal2uncal(double fCal) const {
00129       using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00130       Vector a(n_);
00131       double t(1.0);
00132       for (unsigned u(0); u<n_; ++u) {
00133         a(u)=t; t *= fCal;
00134       }
00135       return std::make_pair(inner_prod(a,x_),
00136                             std::sqrt(inner_prod(a, Vector(prod(q_, a)))));
00137     }
00138     // returns a value,RMS pair
00139     // NOTE: for n_ != 2 this is broken
00140     std::pair<double,double> uncal2cal(double fUncal) const {
00141       using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00142       const double fCal((fUncal-x_(0))/x_(1));
00143       Vector a(2); a(0)=-1.0/x_(1); a(1)=-fCal/x_(1); 
00144       return std::make_pair(fCal, std::sqrt(inner_prod(a, Vector(prod(q_, a)))));       
00145     }
00146     
00147     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00148       Base::dump_header(os);
00149       return os << " clockOffset_Hz clockOffset_ppm clockOffsetRMS_Hz clockOffsetRMS_ppm";
00150     }
00151     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00152       return os << boost::format("%6.3f")  % x_(0) << " "
00153                 << boost::format("%10.2f") % (1e6*(1-x_(1))) << " "
00154                 << boost::format("%7.3f")  % std::sqrt(q_(0,0)) << " "
00155                 << boost::format("%7.2f")  % (1e6*std::sqrt(q_(1,1))) << " ";
00156     }
00157   private:
00158     size_t n_;
00159     Matrix q_;
00160     Vector x_;
00161     double offsetMax_;
00162     double ppmMax_;
00163   } ;
00164 } // namespace Result
00165 
00166 #endif // _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATION_HPP_cm101026_
